        public void addEffect(MiscItems effect,
                      int positionItemUsed)

      • getLevel

        public int getLevel()
        Gets the character's level.
        Returns:

      • setLevel

        public void setLevel()
        Sets the character's level. It checks if the character's experience meets the requirement for a level up, and if so it levels up the character. If the character has enough experience for more than 1 level it loops until all the bonus experience is used up.

      • xpUntilLevel

        public java.lang.String xpUntilLevel()
        Returns a string that tells the character how much more experience they need for a level up.
        Returns:
        how much more experience needed for a level up.
